## ColorThemeOptions.palette property

Palette name or custom color array. If a string, must match a built-in palette name for the chosen type. If an array, provides custom colors.

**Signature:**

```typescript
palette: QualitativePaletteName | SequentialPaletteName | DivergingPaletteName | ColorPalette;
```
